Uses of Matrix in com.jswiff.swfrecords
 

Methods in com.jswiff.swfrecords that return Matrix
 Matrix MorphFillStyle.getEndBitmapMatrix()
          Returns the bitmap matrix used to map the bitmap to the filled shape in the end state of the morph sequence.
 Matrix MorphFillStyle.getEndGradientMatrix()
          Returns the transform matrix used to map the gradient from the gradient square to the display surface in the end state of the morph sequence.
 Matrix MorphFillStyle.getStartBitmapMatrix()
          Returns the bitmap matrix used to map the bitmap to the filled shape in the start state of the morph sequence.
 Matrix MorphFillStyle.getStartGradientMatrix()
          Returns the transform matrix used to map the gradient from the gradient square to the display surface in the start state of the morph sequence.
 Matrix FillStyle.getBitmapMatrix()
          Returns the bitmap matrix used to map the bitmap to the filled shape.
 Matrix FillStyle.getGradientMatrix()
          Returns the transform matrix used to map the gradient from the gradient square to the display surface.
 Matrix ButtonRecord.getPlaceMatrix()
          Returns the transformation matrix used when placing the character.
